## Books
Notes for books we have read can be found in Chapter \@ref(readingnotes).

- Data Feminism [@dignazio_data_2020], notes in Ch \@ref(datafem)
  * Author-led online reading group recordings and sketchnotes are a wonderful resource, [here](http://datafeminism.io/blog/book/data-feminism-reading-group/)
  * Publications by book authors: [@dignazio_feminist_2016; @balaam_hacking_2017; @klein_seven_2020; @dignazio_feminist_2016; @garcia_no_2020]
  * Feminist HCI: [@bardzell_feminist_2010; @bellini_feminist_2018]
  * Many of the resources included in our list below are cited in DataFem

- Race After Technology: Abolitionist Tools for the New Jim Code [@benjamin_race_2019], notes in Ch \@ref(raceaftertech)
- Weapons of Math Destruction: How Big Data Increases Inequality and Threatens Democracy [@oneil_weapons_2016], notes in Ch \@ref(womd)


Comprehensive list

- Algorithms of Oppression: How Search Engines Reinforce Racism [@noble_algorithms_2018]
- Automating Inequality: How High-Tech Tools Profile, Police, and Punish the Poor [@eubanks_automating_2018]
- Invisible Women: Exposing Data Bias in a World Designed for Men [@perez_invisible_2019]



- Indigenous Statistics: A Quantitative Research Methodology [@walter_indigenous_2016]
- Braiding Sweetgrass: Indigenous Wisdom, Scientific Knowledge, and the Teachings of Plants [@kimmerer_braiding_2015]
- The Hospital: Life, Death, and Dollars in a Small American Town [@alexander_hospital_2021]

- Medical Apartheid: A Dark History of Medical Experimentation on Black Americans from Colonial Times to the Present [@washington_medical_2008]

- The Alignment Problem [@christian_allignment_2020]
- Ghost Work: How to Stop Silicon Valley from Building a Global Underclass [@gray_suri_ghost_2019]
- The Age of Surveillance Capitalism [@zuboff_surveillance_2019]
- Technically Wrong: Sexist Apps, Biased Algorithms, and Other Threats of Toxic Tech [@wachter_technically_2017]

- Atlas of AI: Power, Politics, and the Planetary Costs of Artificial Intelligence [@crawford_atlas_2021]
- Glitch Feminism [@russell_glitch_2020], [website](https://www.legacyrussell.com/GLITCHFEMINISM) also includes videos
- Design Justice [@costanzachock_design_2020], and wonderful [website](https://designjustice.org/)
